events.impact: Edwin Hubble observed distant galaxies moving away, providing evidence for the Big Bang.
Accidental discovery of the faint afterglow of the Big Bang, confirming the theory.
Detection of 51 Pegasi b, proving planets exist outside our solar system.
Observations showed the universe's expansion is speeding up, leading to the concept of dark energy.
LIGO directly detected ripples in spacetime from merging black holes.
The Event Horizon Telescope captured the shadow of the supermassive black hole M87*.
The James Webb Space Telescope provided unprecedented views of the universe's earliest structures.
